Watson Institute for International Studies | Brown University
111 Thayer Street | Providence, RI 02912
julia_chuang@brown.edu
EMPLOYMENT
2014-16 Postdoctoral Fellow in International Studies, Watson Institute for International
Dissertation: “The Changing Foundations of Chinese Development: From Low-Cost
Labor to Land Dispossession”
Chair: Michael Burawoy
Studies, Brown University
